subject: Pedals
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,

About 4 (work) days ago I bought "Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal
with Haptic Reactor Optional" with express shipping in the hopes it would
arrive early this week. But there seems to be a bit of a problem and that
is that I still haven't received a message/email about that my order has
been shipped. After doing some research on your website it is also stated
that there is a 1–2 days wait before they ship. Now the 1–2 days already
passed and I haven't got an update on where my pedals are.

Is there any way u can predict when the pedals will arrive at my
destination/or being shipped and would this be possible to have
before Saturday?

Greets Finn Aders
(order number: #SSN3133)

conversations.body_text: Hi Finn Aders,  We apologize for the inconvenience. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, and restocking has encountered some delays. We will ship your order via DHL Express within the next two days, with an estimated delivery date around the 8th.
